titleStmt.title: Lux in tenebris. Or, A clavis to the Treasury in Broad-Street.
titleStmt.author: Fauntleroy, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Tyton at the three Daggers in Fleet-Street,

notesStmt.note: Thomason received his copy in November 1653.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Fauntleroy"; "Nou. 29. 1653."; 4 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
